float32.name: indoor ambient radiosity power
float32.description: the indoor ambient light power from 0 to infinity

float32.name: outdoor ambient radiosity power
float32.description: the outdoor ambient light power from 0 to infinity

float32.name: outdoor fog maximum density
float32.description: density at opaque distance - 0 defaults to 1

float32.name: outdoor fog start distance
float32.description: below this distance there is no fog

float32.name: outdoor fog opaque distance
float32.description: beyond this distance surfaces are completely fogged

float32.name: indoor fog maximum density
float32.description: density at opaque distance - 0 defaults to 1

float32.name: indoor fog start distance
float32.description: below this distance there is no fog

float32.name: indoor fog opaque distance
float32.description: beyond this distance surfaces are completely fogged

tagRef.name: indoor fog screen
tagRef.description: used for FOG SCREEN only; not used for planar fog

ascii.name: global function name
ascii.description: the global function that controls this shader value

int16.name: animation index
int16.description: the index of the animation in the animation graph

reflexive.name: lights

ascii.name: lens flare marker name
ascii.description: the lens flare for this light will be attached to the specified marker in the model

reflexive.comment: these parameters control how the light illuminates the world.

float32.name: test distance
float32.description: the length of the ray for shadow testing.

degree.name: direction
degree.description: direction toward the light source in the sky. y

degree.name: direction
degree.description: direction toward the light source in the sky. p

degree.name: diameter
degree.description: angular diameter of the light source in the sky.
